alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Frontier; Lincoln; Logan; Loup; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 12:42AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Frontier, western Loup, eastern Lincoln, Logan, eastern McPherson, Custer, Blaine and Thomas Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1241 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Halsey to 14 miles northeast of Gandy to near Arnold to 7 miles southwest of Brady. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Broken Bow, Curtis, Stapleton, Thedford, Brewster, Arnold, Callaway, Brady, Eustis, Merna, Maxwell, Oconto, Anselmo, Dunning, Wellfleet, Halsey, Moorefield, Gandy and Victoria Springs State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 near mile marker 144. Highway 2 between mile markers 201 and 286. Highway 92 between mile markers 216 and 273. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 178 and 208. Highway 83 between mile markers 47 and 77, and between mile markers 87 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for central, southwestern and north central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Frontier; Lincoln; Logan; Loup; McPherson; Thomas
